;In September 2020, General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized during his inspection in Hunan: “We must firmly establish that clear waters and lush mountains are gold and silver mountains. concept and demonstrate new achievements in the construction of ecological civilization."

;

;The cadres and masses of Hunan Province have kept in mind the instructions, thoroughly implemented Xi Jinping's thoughts on ecological civilization, adhered to ecological priority and green development, promoted the green transformation of development methods, and strived to improve Economic development "contains green content" and strives to show new achievements in the construction of ecological civilization.

;

;In Zixing City, the local area continues to fight hard to prevent and control pollution. The outbound water quality of Dongjiang Lake has maintained the national surface Class I water standard all year round and reached the national first-class drinking water standard, becoming the largest domestic drinking water source in Hunan Province. land. Relying on its ecological advantages, Zixing City built a food industrial park to make natural water, beverages and other products popular in the market. It also used the cold water resources of Dongjiang Lake to dissipate heat and cool down servers, attracting many companies to settle in the big data industrial park.

;

;In the East Dongting Lake National Nature Reserve in Yueyang City, the wetland is shaded by reeds and finless porpoises leap in the water, which is full of vitality. Nowadays, when people stop at the patrol and monitoring station of the reserve, they can admire the beautiful coastline of the Yangtze River and savor the songs of migratory birds, the silhouettes of elk, and the smiles of finless porpoises. Over the past five years, Yueyang City has taken powerful measures such as cracking down on the "chemical encirclement of the river", banning sand and gravel terminals, and reviving the shoreline ecology, so that the ecological environment here continues to improve, and the butterfly has become a national 4A-level scenic spot, Finless Porpoise Bay.

;

;Starting from 2022, the integrated protection and restoration project of mountains, rivers, forests, fields, lakes, grass and sand in the Dongting Lake area will be launched to enhance biodiversity, control non-point source pollution, and restore the mine ecological environment... "Guarding a clear river" will Go deeper.

;

;Faced with ecological debt, Hunan has deepened the joint management of the "four water" systems of the Yangtze River, Dongting Lake and Xiangzi Yuanli from the perspective of ecosystem integrity and river basin systems, and spared no effort to repair the ecological environment.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Xiangjiang River Basin has launched a tough battle to prevent and control heavy metal pollution. Hunan has shut down and eliminated more than 1,200 heavy metal-related companies. From 2018 to 2022, the province will exit 3,249 enterprises with backward production capacity.

;

;Efforts will be made to promote the conversion of old and new driving forces, and Hunan will accelerate the construction of an economic system with green, low-carbon and circular development.

;

;Promote the transformation and upgrading of traditional advantageous industries and move towards high-end, intelligent and green industries. The Sinopec Changling Refining and Chemical Company on the bank of Dongting Lake is lined with green trees. "Through transformation and upgrading of production technology, we have strengthened wastewater management and control, integrated all sewage into the pipe network, and prevented sewage from entering the Yangtze River." Chen Bin, deputy general manager of the company, said.

;

;Promote emerging industries to shift gears and accelerate the development of new energy, new materials, power equipment and other industries. Ningxiang High-tech Zone has cultivated more than 20 regulated companies in energy storage materials. From battery cathode material precursors to waste battery recycling, a complete lithium battery energy storage industry chain has been formed. In the TBEA 5G Technology Industrial Park in Hengnan County, Hengyang City, a full range of distribution transformers and other products are sold well at home and abroad. The local area has taken advantage of the situation to introduce upstream and downstream enterprises, and the power equipment industry cluster is growing day by day.

;

;As of the end of 2022, Hunan has cultivated a total of 136 national-level green factories, 13 green parks and 16 green supply chain management demonstration enterprises. In 2021 and 2022, the energy consumption per unit of industrial added value of enterprises above designated size in the province has continued to decline significantly.

;

;Accelerating green development is inseparable from the "baton" of assessment. The newly revised "Hunan Province's Assessment and Evaluation Methods for Promoting High-Quality Development of County Economy" proposes to encourage differentiated development of counties and cities and to compete and catch up in different tracks. For example, for counties and cities that lead the integration of culture and tourism, especially counties with small populations, the focus will be on increasing people’s income, protecting the ecological environment, integrating culture, tourism and agriculture, etc.

;

;As of the end of 2022, Hunan Province’s forest coverage rate reached 59.98%, the water quality rate of 147 national examination sections reached 98.6%, and it has 70 national wetland parks. Amidst the green mountains and green waters, Hunan has delivered a brilliant ecological answer sheet.

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 4th  On November 4th, President Xi Jinping expressed concern about the severe earthquake in Nepal Sent a message of condolence to President Paudel of Nepal.

;

;Xi Jinping said that he was shocked to learn that a strong earthquake occurred in Karnali Province in your country, causing heavy casualties and property losses. On behalf of the Chinese government and people, I would like to express my deep condolences for the victims, extend my sincere condolences to the families of the victims and the injured, and wish the injured a speedy recovery.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that I believe that under the leadership of President Baudel and the Nepali government, people in the earthquake-stricken areas will be able to overcome difficulties and rebuild their homes as soon as possible. ;On the same day, Premier Li Qiang of the State Council sent a message of condolence to Nepalese Prime Minister Prachanda.

;; Sun, 05 Nov 2023 05:56:08 +0800 01版要闻 - 以“基层之治”夯实“中国之治”http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/05/nw.D110000renmrb_20231105_3-01.htm
;Sunday, November 5, 2023
; ;

;The strong grassroots will make the country strong, and the security of the grassroots will make the world safe. Whether grassroots governance is good or not depends on the grassroots party organizations and the majority of party members and cadres.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping has made important instructions on many occasions, requiring that the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era be upheld and developed at the grassroots level of society.

;

;The "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era puts more emphasis on the party's leadership, more highlights the rule of law thinking, more prominent scientific and technological support, and more attention to social participation, showing its timeless charm and becoming our country's guide for promoting grassroots social governance. A "golden sign".

;

;Revitalize through persistence and carry forward through development. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, we have adhered to and developed the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era. Our country's social governance system of joint construction, joint governance and shared benefits has been further improved. The mechanism for correctly handling contradictions among the people under the new situation has been further improved. The majority of grassroots party members and cadres have promptly resolved conflicts. Disputes are resolved at the grassroots level and in the bud, the efficiency of social governance is further improved, and the people's sense of gain, happiness, and security continues to increase.

;

;This year marks the 60th anniversary of Comrade Mao Zedong’s instructions to study and promote the “Maple Bridge Experience” and the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Xi Jinping’s instructions to uphold and develop the “Maple Bridge Experience”. Rooted in the fertile soil of history and culture, forging ahead on a new journey, adhering to and developing the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era will surely further promote the modernization of my country's grassroots social governance system and governance capabilities, and will more effectively ensure that people live and work in peace and contentment, and that society is stable and secure. Preface, the country enjoys long-term peace and stability.

;

;;More emphasis on the party’s leadership, and continuously transform the party’s political advantages, organizational advantages, and close contact with the masses into grassroots governance effectiveness;

;

;In “Maple Bridge In Fengqiao Town, Zhuji City, Zhejiang Province, the birthplace of "Experience", there is an old party member who always likes to bring a small bench and sit among the neighbors, chatting about homely things, and has helped many people untie their "knots" in their hearts.

;

;His name is Yang Guangguang, a retired policeman from Fengqiao Police Station. After retirement, he has been committed to grassroots dispute mediation. He has recorded more than 100 "mediation diaries". In the words of Yang Guangzhao, "Mediation is about using the wisdom of the people to resolve the conflicts of the people. If everyone works together and handles the little things well, Fengqiao Town will be more harmonious and beautiful."

;

;60 In the past few years, the "Maple Bridge Experience" has already gone beyond Zhejiang and spread across the country, and has been continuously enriched and developed in practice.

;

;Xianlin Street, Qixia District, Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province, was a place where petitions and complaints were frequent and conflicts occurred frequently. The subdistrict jurisdiction includes both high-end communities and demolished resettlement communities, well-known universities, and many "five small industries". The subjects and objects are diverse, which brings considerable challenges to governance.

;

;“Pick up the coat and collar, and lead the cow by the nose.” "Open a network" to weave a dense organizational system, "front-line methods" to promote cadres to sink, "family members" to gather regional resources, "one heart" to link up the party and the masses to jointly govern, and handle petitions as a "mass work that comes to your door" with heart and soul. Do it well and make the people feel at ease.

;

;If the foundation is not strong, the ground will shake. The grassroots level is the foundation of the party's governance and the source of strength. In 2021, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Council issued the "Opinions on Strengthening the Modernization of Grassroots Governance Systems and Governance Capabilities", making special arrangements for "improving the system of comprehensive leadership of the Party at the grassroots level."

;

;In recent years, various localities and departments have adhered to and developed the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era, and have always regarded strengthening grassroots party building and consolidating the party's ruling foundation as a red line that runs through social governance and grassroots construction.

;

;Some places use the method of "grid party building" to continuously extend the reach of party organizations to every corner of the jurisdiction, so that "things are done online, but difficult problems are solved online";

;

; p>;

;Some places use the method of "regional party building" to promote joint building and co-building between government agencies, enterprises and institutions and township (street) and village (community) party organizations to consolidate the ability to resolve conflicts and disputes on the spot in a timely manner;< /p>;

;Some places actively explore long-term mechanisms for the decentralization of party members and cadres, maintain close contact with the people in their jurisdictions, and promptly identify and solve problems;

;

;Some places embed party organizations into Modern real estate improves the efficiency of management entities' participation in community public affairs, and improves the happiness index of community residents with higher-quality property services...

;

;As big as a big country is, it also has the weight of a big country. Thousands of things, in the final analysis, are the affairs of thousands of households. To deeply implement the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era and vigorously strengthen the construction of grassroots party organizations, the key is to adhere to and implement the party's mass line well, and to solve the urgent, difficult and anxious problems of the masses with heart and soul.

;

;In recent years, Beijing has innovatively carried out the reform of "party building leads the way and handles complaints immediately". The municipal party committee secretary holds a monthly special meeting of the municipal party committee and a monthly work review meeting of the district party committee (department party group) secretary. The district party committee secretary holds a monthly review meeting of the street and township party committee secretaries. The street and township party committee secretaries directly dispatch the village and social party organization secretaries. The vast majority of party members and cadres go to the grassroots, run work orders, follow procedures, and stay in positions, focusing on the front line, the masses, and problems. Nowadays, as long as people call 12345 to report problems, someone will immediately respond and accept the problem, and we strive to ensure that the problem is handled quickly and completed.

;

;Party building leads and unites efforts. Today, in the fields, on the streets, and in the buildings of business districts, the party's political leadership, ideological guidance, mass organization, and social appeal are fully exerted. The party's political advantages, organizational advantages, and close ties with the masses are constantly transformed into grassroots Governance effectiveness.

;

;;It will further demonstrate the thinking of the rule of law and form a strong atmosphere of doing things according to the law, finding methods when encountering problems, solving problems and resolving conflicts by relying on the law;

;

;Entering a new era, Social governance faces new challenges. How to uphold and develop the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era and resolve various conflicts and disputes with high quality?

;

;The rule of law is the basic way of governing the country. The report of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China proposed: "Promote multi-level and multi-field governance according to law, and improve the level of legalization of social governance."

;

;In 2022, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Council issued the "Regulations on Letters and Calls" to incorporate letters and calls into the rule of law. We should guide all localities and departments to persist in using legal thinking to understand problems and use legal methods to solve problems.

;

;Nowadays, whether it is land expropriation, house demolition, labor relations mediation, community property management, ecological environment protection, and business environment optimization, the majority of party members and cadres insist on strengthening the use of legal thinking and the rule of law to determine Disputes were resolved and cases were resolved, effectively safeguarding the legitimate rights and interests of the masses and maintaining social harmony and stability.

;

;In a criminal complaint case of intentional injury in a certain place, in order to help the complainant untie the "heart knot" and repair the relationship between the community and neighbors, the prosecutor's office invited lawyers, mediators, street staff representatives, etc. as hearing persons , went to the complainant’s community to hold a public hearing, and successfully settled the complaint. In recent years, in order to reduce the number of complaints filed by petitioners, procuratorial organs in various places have vigorously promoted simple public hearings; at the same time, in order to allow petitioners with physical disabilities or living in remote areas to participate in public hearings, procuratorial organs have also innovatively used the new form of "door-to-door hearings". Resolve conflicts at the "doorsteps" of petitioners.

;

;The construction of the rule of law must not only focus on the end to treat the disease, but also focus on the front end to treat the disease before it occurs. Nowadays, many places are exploring innovations, putting non-litigation dispute resolution mechanisms at the forefront, pushing more legal forces to guide and ease, and strengthening the prevention of conflicts and disputes at the source, front-end resolution, and checkpoint control.

;

;Shanghai has built a unified platform for online and offline mediation work, and has fully established non-litigation dispute resolution centers at the municipal and district levels. Hundreds of mediation organizations have settled in, and other mediation organizations and notarization, arbitration , administrative adjudication, administrative reconsideration and other institutions are regularly stationed to resolve conflicts through joint efforts;

;

;Guangdong Province actively promotes commercial mediation work. There are 330 commercial mediation organizations in the province and 2,232 registered commercial mediators. Since 2022, Mediated 25,000 commercial disputes;

;

;Zhejiang courts vigorously promoted the construction of an "online diversified dispute resolution platform" to provide the public with one-stop services such as online consultation, mediation, and litigation, and realized "funnel-style" resolution of conflicts and disputes. Through layer-by-layer filtering, a total of 3.276 million disputes have been mediated...

;

;As a legal system with Chinese characteristics, people's mediation plays a fundamental role in the diversified resolution mechanism for conflicts and disputes. Statistics from the Ministry of Justice show that there are 693,000 people's mediation committees across the country, basically forming an organizational network covering urban and rural areas and key areas and units. In 2022, the National People's Mediation Organization mediated 14.94 million conflicts and disputes of various types.

;

;Wu Jingjing, director of the People’s Mediation Committee of Xiangyun Town, Wen County, Henan Province, has been engaged in mediation work for 11 years. She said: "When the masses find me, it means they trust me. Letting the masses' troubles be properly resolved is the goal I have always pursued."

;

;In 2021, Wu Jingjing obtained the legal professional qualification certificate. In the past few years, she has used her professional expertise to promote legal knowledge, answer legal questions, and write legal documents. She has received more than 2,800 legal consultations. "Mastering legal knowledge adds the ability to do mass work. If you speak reasonably and do things fairly, the people will be convinced." Wu Jingjing said.

;

;Use legal thinking to prevent conflicts at the source, focusing on cultivating a profound legal culture. If everyone believes in the Fa and follows the Fa in everything, there will naturally be fewer conflicts.

;

;A unique mock trial was held at the Demonstration Training Base for Legally Comprehensive People in Fuzhou City, Jiangxi Province. The protagonists of the "trial" were "legally savvy people" who were mainly village cadres. In interpreting the law based on cases, "people who understand the law" gradually understand how to protect their own rights and interests reasonably and legally. Since 2015, Chongren County, Fuzhou City has been exploring the cultivation of a "law-savvy person" in every household in the county, and the rural customs and folk customs have been completely renewed.

;

;Nowadays, the implementation of the training project of "legally literate people" in rural (community) has been included in the national "Eighth Five-Year Plan" for legal popularization. As of June this year, more than 3.83 million "law-savvy people" have been cultivated across the country, basically achieving full coverage of "law-savvy people" in all administrative villages. They are like sowing "seeds of the rule of law". The concept of rule of law, which is to act according to the law, find the law when encountering problems, use the law to solve problems, and resolve conflicts by relying on the law, has taken root at the grassroots level in rural areas. Grassroots governance combines autonomy, rule of law, and rule of virtue. The system is more sound.

;

;;Give more emphasis on scientific and technological support, and improve the grassroots governance platform with grid management, refined services, and information support;

;

;Social governance must be good at serving the people. Combine the Party's fine traditions with new technologies and new means to innovate mechanisms to benefit the people, serve the people, and relieve the people's worries.

;

;"Someone in the community is competing with me for a parking space. Please handle it as soon as possible." A few days ago, Ms. Wu, who lives in Qinglongtan Community, Decheng District, Dezhou City, Shandong Province, reported a conflict and dispute online through a small program on her mobile phone.

;

;It turned out that Ms. Wu parked her car in a public parking space in the community, but her neighbor Brother Zhang said that he had already occupied the parking space. The two refused to give in to each other and had a dispute. After receiving the situation report, the Decheng District Grid Governance Platform dispatched orders as soon as possible. The grid mediator immediately went to the scene to explain the law, reason and feelings. In the end, the matter was properly resolved and both parties shook hands and made peace.

;

;The integration of manpower and technology is one of the most distinctive features of the development of "Maple Bridge Experience" to this day.

;

;In recent years, in the process of adhering to and developing the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era, many localities and departments have made full use of big data, cloud computing and other technologies to innovate the methods and means of grassroots governance, and strive to build and improve The grassroots governance platform with grid management, refined services and information support makes governance smarter and more efficient.

;

;Kaifeng City, Henan Province has built a multi-network integrated three-dimensional social governance and supervision system to realize command, dispatch, and verification anytime and anywhere, greatly improving the efficiency of conflict and dispute resolution;

;

;Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province The People's Court of Huangpu District has developed the "Pu Law and Good Governance e-Platform" to resolve conflicts and disputes on the palm of your hand and at any time through online mediation;

;

;Jimei District, Xiamen City, Fujian Province has established a "Smart Jimei" social governance command center line Go to the platform, coordinate the resources of all parties, and respond to the demands of the masses in a timely and efficient manner...

;

;The best way to govern society is to resolve conflicts before they occur. The application of scientific and technological means has not only improved the efficiency of resolving conflicts and disputes, but also enhanced the ability of early warning, prediction and prevention, making urban and rural areas more peaceful and the people more at ease.

;

;"Secretary Liu, the intelligent prevention and control system has issued a fire warning. The location is in the Cao Family Courtyard. Please go and understand the situation immediately. We will arrive soon." Not long ago, the Public Security Bureau of Shizhu Tujia Autonomous County, Chongqing City The "Safe Village·Smart Farmhouse" intelligent prevention and control system of the Guantian Police Station of Zhongyi Police Station issued an early warning message, and the police on duty immediately contacted Liu Chengyong, secretary of the Party branch of Pingba Village in the jurisdiction.

;

;After on-site investigation, it was found that a short circuit in the electrical wiring of Cao, a villager in the area, ignited the firewood pile. Thanks to the timely warning of the intelligent prevention and control system, relevant personnel arrived quickly and extinguished the source of the fire immediately to avoid losses.

;

;From early warning and containing a hidden danger, to analyzing and deploying a type of problem, many places also use big data methods to analyze the overall security situation and outstanding problems in the jurisdiction, and take targeted measures.

;

;A call from the "police" made Ms. Li from Xinqiao Town, Rong County, Zigong City, Sichuan Province nervous: Worried about a "very serious" economic case, Ms. Li followed the other party's prompts and came to A hotel in the county town "resolved through negotiation." Just when she downloaded the APP provided by the other party and prepared to transfer money, the police from Xuyang Police Station of Rong County Public Security Bureau rushed to the hotel and successfully prevented a telecommunications fraud.

;

;Which type of people are easily deceived, and which area has more police incidents... Relying on the construction of public security big data applications, the Rong County Public Security Bureau has integrated the prevention of telecommunications fraud into grassroots governance, and promoted the construction of "Skynet" and "Smart Community" "Create, quickly check and accurately judge the clues of key personnel involved in fraud, and promptly remind and dissuade the defrauded people.

;

;Nowadays, similar intelligent platforms and intelligent terminals are widely used. Through the digitization and informatization of the actual situation in the jurisdiction and various business tasks, we build a series of models and set a series of indicators to strengthen the dynamic monitoring, research and analysis of various risks and hidden dangers, and the social conflict risk early warning, command and dispatch, and closed-loop processing capabilities have been effectively improved. Improve and strive to achieve the transformation from "no handing over of conflicts" to "less or no occurrence of conflicts".

;

;;Pay more attention to social participation and improve the social governance system of joint construction, joint governance and sharing;

;

;When you walk into Fengqiao Town today, you can always see a group of people wearing People in red vests walk around the streets, greeting the masses and helping them solve their problems. Although they are of different ages and occupations, they have a common name - "Red Maple Vigilante".

;

;Since the establishment of the "Red Maple Vigilantes" in 2017, the volunteer team has continued to grow and is located in various administrative villages in Fengqiao Town. They assist in security patrols, legal publicity, dispute mediation and other tasks, and are known as popular among the masses. The "new police force" of Maple Bridge is safe.

;

;Grassroots affairs are many and complicated. We cannot rely solely on government departments. We must give full play to the role of all aspects of society and stimulate the vitality of the whole society. The affairs of the masses should be discussed with the masses, and everyone should participate in everyone's affairs.

;

;Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, all localities and departments have insisted on integrity and innovation, paid more attention to social participation, and further improved the social governance system of joint construction, joint governance and sharing.

;

;Some places give full play to the role of party members in setting an example, and encourage in-service party members to report to grid party branches, take the lead in participating in community governance, carry out voluntary services, and implement commitments;

;

;Some places fully implement Give full play to grid workers, security guards, volunteers, Xinxiang Xian, "five old personnel" (retired comrades such as veteran cadres, veteran soldiers, veteran experts, veteran teachers, veteran models), and safety volunteers who are close to the masses and familiar with the situation. Advantages, extend work reach, and improve the effect of preventing and resolving conflicts and disputes;

;

;Some places adopt measures such as "points system" rewards and selection of building team leaders to stimulate the enthusiasm of the masses to participate in grassroots governance, and widely mobilize the masses to carry out Volunteer service activities such as infrastructure management and security, security patrols and prevention, conflict and dispute resolution, safety hazard investigation, and care for special groups;

;

;In some places, for industries prone to conflicts and disputes such as medical care, labor, and commerce, Give full play to the role of the market mechanism and guide market entities and social organizations to use their professional advantages and participate in resolution work...

;

;Today, there are groups such as the "Chaoyang Masses" in Beijing and the "Alley Stewards" in Tianjin. With continuous development and growth, a social governance community in which everyone has responsibilities, everyone fulfills his responsibilities, and everyone enjoys is gradually established.

;

;Social participation requires not only gathering the wisdom and efforts of all people, but also listening to the voices of the people and following their will.

;

;"What are your opinions and suggestions on environmental improvement work?" "What are the difficulties in industrial development?"... As night fell, in Yelaowu Central Village, Liangting Township, Huaining County, Anhui Province, cadres and the masses sat together on a street. The stools talked about the shortcomings of parents and the revitalization of the countryside, starting a "rural night talk".

;

;Huaining County actively promotes the normalization and long-term effectiveness of "Rural Night Talk". The majority of party members and cadres insist on visiting and chatting among villagers, collecting village conditions and public opinion, listening to opinions and suggestions, and allowing villagers to govern in the countryside. "Playing the leading role" in the film. Since this year, "Country Night Talk" has been held in 232 local villages (communities) for more than 1,400 times.

;

;The people are the "source of running water" for grassroots social governance. Only by mobilizing the enthusiasm and initiative of the broad masses of the people to the greatest extent can the greatest synergy of grassroots social governance be formed.

;

;Haikou City in Hainan Province has established a "community council", Chongqing City has implemented "yard autonomy" for rural neighborhood disputes, and Yueyang City in Hunan Province has carried out "heroes to distinguish right from wrong"... Various places are adhering to and developing "Maple Leaf" in the new era. In the process of "Bridge Experience", we promoted civil consultation, civil affairs and civil administration, which effectively channelized public opinion and united the people's hearts, promoted the prevention and resolution of conflicts and disputes, and formed an environment where everyone participates, everyone does his best, and everyone has a sense of accomplishment. Vivid situation.

;

;On the way forward, all localities will comprehensively study and implement Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, work hard and work diligently, continue to write bright chapters of the "Maple Bridge Experience" in the new era, and let the people's The sense of gain, happiness, and security will be more fulfilling, more secure, and more sustainable, creating a stable, united, harmonious, and stable social environment for promoting Chinese-style modernization.

;Our newspaper, Shanghai, November 4  (Reporters Li Xiaohong, Yang Xun) Premier Li Qiang of the State Council, November 4 On the afternoon of the same day, he met in Shanghai with Cuban Prime Minister Marrero, who was in China to attend the Sixth China International Import Expo.

;

;Li Qiang said that China and Cuba are both socialist countries led by the Communist Party, and the special friendly relations between the two sides are unbreakable and will grow stronger over time. President Xi Jinping and President Díaz-Canel agreed to jointly build a community with a shared future between China and Cuba, which is a strategic choice that is in line with the fundamental interests of both countries. China is willing to work with Cuba to implement the important consensus reached by the two heads of state, strengthen political mutual trust, expand mutually beneficial cooperation, transform China-Cuba high-level relations into more practical results, and promote the continuous deepening and solidification of the construction of a community with a shared future between China and Cuba.

;

;Li Qiang pointed out that China will, as always, support Cuba in its just struggle to safeguard sovereignty and oppose interference, and is willing to continue to strengthen communication and cooperation with Cuba in multilateral fields, jointly defend fairness and justice, and promote global governance in a more fair and reasonable direction. . China firmly supports Cuba's socialist construction and is willing to work with Cuba to strengthen the docking of development strategies, give full play to their economic complementary advantages, and take the high-quality "Belt and Road" cooperation as a guide to expand the scale of bilateral trade in new energy, biomedicine, agriculture, tourism, Create more highlights of cooperation in areas such as the digital economy and bring more tangible benefits to the people of the two countries.

;

;Marrero said that Cuba and China both unswervingly follow the path of socialism with their own characteristics, and have achieved important results in all-round cooperation. Cuba firmly supports the major global initiatives put forward by President Xi Jinping, firmly defends the one-China principle, and is willing to work with China to implement the important consensus reached by the top leaders of the two countries, strengthen exchanges of experience in governance between the two parties and two countries, deepen mutually beneficial cooperation in various fields, and jointly Promote the construction of the "Belt and Road" and promote the development of the international order in a more just and reasonable direction. Cuba will make unremitting efforts to promote cooperation between China and Latin American and Caribbean countries.

;

;After the meeting, the two prime ministers jointly witnessed the signing of a number of bilateral cooperation documents.

;

;Chen Jining and Wu Zhenglong participated in the above activities.

;

;

;

;Our newspaper, Shanghai, November 4th  (Reporters Wang Fang, Yang Xun) On the afternoon of November 4th, Premier Li Qiang of the State Council met in Shanghai to attend the Sixth Serbian Prime Minister Brnabic attended the China International Import Expo.

;

;2023年11月05日星期日
; ;

;“没有网络安全就没有国家安全，就没有经济社会稳定运行，广大人民群众利益也难以得到保障。”习近平总书记高瞻远瞩的战略擘画和深邃思考，为推动我国网络安全体系的建立、树立正确的网络安全观指明了方向。

;

;国家网络安全人才与创新基地自2016年落户湖北省武汉市东西湖区以来，昔日径河之畔的一片荒滩，发生精彩变化。

;

;在中央网信办和相关部门指导下，武汉市和东西湖区坚持把建好用好网络安全基地作为推动科技创新和高质量发展的新赛道，积极探索网络安全教育、技术、产业融合发展新机制，聚力打造“中国网谷”。

;

;湖北天融信网络安全技术有限公司的车联网安全实验室里，技术人员正在对智能网联车试验区的汽车进行模拟测试，以验证最新的车载防火墙防御能力是否正常。

;

;总部位于北京的天融信科技集团，是国内领先的网络安全、大数据与云服务提供商。2019年7月入驻网络安全基地以来，湖北天融信聚焦工业互联网、车联网、物联网等领域开展技术创新和产品研发，如今成长为集团的第二大综合性研发中心。

;

;“刚到武汉时，我们只有70人，现在已扩大到680人，其中80%是研发人员。”湖北天融信武汉研发中心总经理左世涛说，今年1至9月，公司营业额同比增长35%。

;

;径河之畔，网络安全产业发展势能涌动。“网络安全基地陆续引入360、奇安信、天融信、绿盟科技等网络安全龙头企业，还有华为、浪潮、新华三、航天科工、中科曙光等信息技术领域知名企业，已汇聚企业220余家，基本形成覆盖硬件安全、通信安全、应用安全、数据安全的网络安全产业链。”武汉市东西湖区委书记彭涛表示，网络安全基地聚焦网络系统和数据安全、网络安全培育服务等12个重点领域，正在持续推动产业延链补链强链。

;

;网络空间的竞争，归根结底是人才竞争。

;

;武汉大学新珈楼、华中科技大学明德楼仿佛“双子星”，矗立于网络安全基地核心区。新珈楼的网络靶场、虚拟仿真实验室内，学生们正在上实训课。“网安人才培养更加注重实战，我们和基地企业建立了校企协作育人模式，企业技术专家到学院任导师、学生到企业实习参加演练等已成常态，学生过条马路就可以到企业实习。”武汉大学国家网络安全学院和华中科技大学网络空间安全学院相关负责人认识高度一致。

;

;“网络安全基地建设，率先布局人才培养工作，坚持'内培'和'外引'两手抓的人才培养模式。”武汉市东西湖区区长周明介绍，“内培”方面，以武汉大学和华中科技大学两所高校为阵地，建设一流网安学院，形成本、硕、博及博士后完整办学体系，今年毕业季，两所高校的网安学院共向社会输送毕业生796人；“外引”方面，围绕引进顶尖型人才、领军型人才、骨干型人才等方面加大政策支持，力争使网络安全基地成为人才高地。

;

;保障网络安全，提高自主创新能力是关键。

;

;本报北京11月4日电  （记者王浩）记者从水利部获悉：2023年（第十批）世界灌溉工程遗产名录于11月4日在国际灌排委员会第七十四届执行理事会上公布，我国安徽七门堰调蓄灌溉系统、江苏洪泽古灌区、山西霍泉灌溉工程、湖北崇阳县白霓古堰4处工程全部申报成功。至此，我国的世界灌溉工程遗产已达34处。

;金融是国民经济的血脉，是国家核心竞争力的重要组成部分。近日，中央金融工作会议在北京举行。习近平总书记出席会议并发表重要讲话，总结党的十八大以来金融工作，分析金融高质量发展面临的形势，部署当前和今后一个时期的金融工作。如何理解这次金融工作会议的重大意义？怎样为经济社会高质量发展营造良好的货币金融环境？怎样深化金融供给侧结构性改革？记者采访了相关部门和专家。

;

;;坚定不移走中国特色金融发展之路，加快建设中国特色现代金融体系;

;

;记者：怎样理解这次会议的重大意义？如何贯彻落实好会议的部署要求？

;

;中国人民银行货币政策司司长邹澜：中央金融工作会议是党的二十大之后召开的一次十分重要的会议。习近平总书记的重要讲话，科学回答了金融事业发展的一系列重大理论和实践问题，是习近平经济思想的重要组成部分，是马克思主义政治经济学关于金融问题的重要创新成果，为新时代新征程推动金融高质量发展提供了根本遵循和行动指南。

;

;这次会议的召开，体现了党中央对金融工作的高度重视，会议对未来一段时期做好金融工作做出全面部署。不折不扣落实好中央金融工作会议的部署要求，必须深刻把握金融工作的政治性、人民性，加快建设金融强国，推进金融高质量发展，坚定不移走中国特色金融发展之路，实施好稳健的货币政策。

;

;中国民生银行首席经济学家温彬：党的十八大以来，党中央把马克思主义金融理论同当代中国具体实际相结合、同中华优秀传统文化相结合，对金融本质规律的认识不断提升到新高度，持续推进金融事业实践创新、理论创新、制度创新，走出了一条中国特色金融发展之路。当前，百年未有之大变局加速演进，加快建设金融强国，必须坚定不移走中国特色金融发展之路，加快建设中国特色现代金融体系。

;

;中国人民银行办公厅副主任傅勇：这次会议用“八个坚持”系统阐述了坚持走中国特色金融发展之路的精髓要义，明确了金融工作怎么看、怎么干，既有世界观，又有方法论，是我们党对金融本质和发展规律认识的进一步深化，必须认真学习领会、坚决贯彻落实。当前，我国正处于全面建设社会主义现代化国家开局起步的关键期，金融工作要以“八个坚持”为指引，健全中国特色现代货币政策框架，始终保持货币政策的稳健性，为经济实现高质量、可持续的增长营造良好的货币金融环境。

;

;;准确把握货币信贷供需规律和新特点，更加注重做好跨周期和逆周期调节;

;

;记者：高质量发展是全面建设社会主义现代化国家的首要任务。如何为高质量发展营造良好的货币金融环境？

;

;邹澜：推动金融更好为经济社会高质量发展服务，要健全中国特色现代货币政策框架，加快现代中央银行制度建设，健全货币政策和宏观审慎政策双支柱调控框架。我们要始终保持货币政策的稳健性，坚持以人民为中心的价值取向，既满足经济发展需要，也坚决不能让老百姓的票子变“毛”，要守护好老百姓手里的钱袋子。

;

;与此同时，要积极营造良好的货币金融环境，保持流动性合理充裕，准确把握货币信贷供需规律和新特点，总量上合理增长，结构上有增有减，节奏上平稳适度，更加注重做好跨周期和逆周期调节，充实货币政策工具箱，为经济社会发展提供高质量金融服务。

;

;温彬：这次会议提出，更加注重做好跨周期和逆周期调节，充实货币政策工具箱。为贯彻落实这一要求，今后一段时期，货币政策取向将保持稳健基调，继续保持货币供应量和社会融资规模增速同名义经济增速基本匹配。在总量上，要继续通过多种货币政策工具组合保持流动性合理充裕，满足实体经济融资需求，切实降低融资成本；在结构上，要继续加大对科技创新、先进制造、绿色发展和中小企业等重大战略、重点领域和薄弱环节的支持力度，继续运用好结构性货币政策工具，持续优化信贷结构，推动经济高质量发展。

;

;;持续深化金融供给侧结构性改革，提升金融服务实体经济的质效;

;

;记者：下一步，如何深化金融供给侧结构性改革，提升金融服务实体经济的质效？

;

;中国人民银行宏观审慎管理局局长李斌：深化金融供给侧结构性改革，要坚持金融服务实体经济的根本宗旨，通过改革、调整和优化金融供给体系，为实体经济发展提供更高质量、更有效率、更加安全的金融服务。

;

;一方面，要推动金融机构改革，促进规范健康发展，提升服务实体经济能力。要通过优化金融机构布局，构建由银行信贷、债券市场、股票市场、风险投资等组成的全方位、多层次金融支持服务体系，持续改善科技创新、小微企业、绿色发展、“三农”等领域金融服务。

;

;另一方面，要促进金融市场发展，优化融资结构体系，改善金融服务效率，推动货币、外汇市场发展，完善金融基础设施，扩大金融高水平开放，提升金融服务跨境贸易和投融资水平，稳慎扎实推进人民币国际化，提高跨境人民币业务服务实体经济的能力。

;

;邹澜：深化金融供给侧结构性改革，要持续推进利率和汇率市场化改革，统筹金融开放和安全，健全市场化利率形成、调控和传导机制，引导融资成本持续下降，加强外汇市场管理，保持人民币汇率在合理均衡水平上的基本稳定。

;

;同时，要优化资金供给结构，强化对科技创新、先进制造、绿色发展和中小微企业等的金融支持。

;

;傅勇：金融是国民经济的血脉，要通过持续深化金融供给侧结构性改革，加快发展科技金融、绿色金融、普惠金融、养老金融、数字金融，不断优化金融机构布局、市场融资结构、金融产品和服务体系，稳步扩大金融领域制度型开放，更好服务重大战略、重点领域和薄弱环节。

;

;需要强调的是，金融是持牌经营行业，要将金融创新发展全面纳入市场化法治化的轨道，打击非法金融活动，健全具有硬约束的金融风险早期纠正机制，做到对金融风险的早识别、早预警、早暴露、早处置。

;

;温彬：这次会议提出，做好科技金融、绿色金融、普惠金融、养老金融、数字金融五篇大文章。这为深化金融供给侧结构性改革、持续提升金融服务实体经济质效指明了方向。

;

;创新是引领发展的第一动力，要实现创新成果的不断涌现与充分转化，就需要更加完善的金融支持创新体系和金融科技赋能机制，科技金融发展至关重要；做好绿色金融，要加快完善绿色金融体系，不断提升服务绿色产业发展能力，积极发展碳金融，支持实现碳达峰、碳中和目标；共同富裕是社会主义的本质要求，也是中国式现代化的重要特征，当前，进一步增强金融服务的普惠性、推进普惠金融高质量发展势在必行；我国人口老龄化规模大、程度深、速度快，带来经济增长和养老负担双重压力，为实现老年人老有所养、老有所依，发展建设养老金融刻不容缓；随着数字技术和实体经济日益深度融合，数字产业化和产业数字化蓬勃发展，未来在我国数字经济不断做强做优做大的趋势下，金融业数字化转型也要不断深化，从而以数字金融创新来更好服务经济社会高质量发展。

;前三季度，工业经济稳定恢复，全国规模以上工业增加值同比增长4%，增速较一季度、上半年分别加快1个、0.2个百分点，呈现回升向好态势。

;

;下一阶段工业经济运行态势预期如何？如何推动工业稳增长？怎样加快中小企业高质量发展？如何加快构建现代化产业体系？本报记者采访了工业和信息化部党组书记、部长金壮龙。

;

;;巩固拓展工业经济回升向好势头，有信心实现全年目标任务;

;

;记者：如何看待当前我国工业经济形势？预计全年工业经济运行态势如何？

;

;金壮龙：今年以来，我国工业经济稳定恢复，呈现回升向好态势，为推动经济运行整体好转提供有力支撑。

;

;从量来看，工业生产稳定增长。截至目前，规模以上工业企业数量达47.8万家，比2022年底增加2.6万家。前三季度，规模以上工业增加值同比增长4%，9月同比增长4.5%；新能源汽车、锂电池、光伏产品、新材料等实现高速增长，造船业三大指标持续全球领跑。

;

;从质来看，产业结构持续优化。前三季度，高技术制造业占规模以上工业增加值比重达到15.3%、装备制造业占比达到32.9%，C919大型客机实现商业运营并进入产业化发展阶段，首艘国产大型邮轮完成研制交付。全国已培育专精特新中小企业10.3万家。上半年，45个国家先进制造业集群主导产业产值合计超过10万亿元。1—9月，178家国家高新技术产业开发区实现工业总产值23.5万亿元，新注册企业数同比增长18.5%。

;

;从势来看，积极因素不断累积。目前工业经济主要指标呈现向好态势，9月份，六成以上工业行业保持增长，高技术制造业投资连续保持两位数增长；10个工业大省规模以上工业增加值增速均超全国平均水平。这说明制造业企业的信心和预期在逐步增强。

;

;总体来说，四季度，我们有信心促进工业经济进一步回升向好。当前我国工业经济仍处于恢复增长和转型升级的关键期，机遇和挑战并存，只要我们坚定信心、精准施策、沉着应对，就有条件、有能力实现全年目标任务，推动工业经济在高质量发展轨道上行稳致远。

;

;;加大重点行业稳增长工作力度，稳住工业经济大盘;

;

;记者：今年以来，10个重点工业行业稳增长工作方案陆续出台，工业和信息化部将采取哪些举措进一步推动工业稳增长？

;

;金壮龙：今年以来，我们一方面着力恢复和扩大需求，促进投资、消费、出口共同发力，夯实工业稳增长基础；一方面着力提高供给质量和水平，稳产业、强企业、优环境，激发工业增长内生动力。下一步，我们将注重打好政策举措“组合拳”，进一步稳预期强信心。

;

;一是加大政策措施落地见效。加强产业政策与财税、金融、贸易、投资等政策的精准对接和协同发力。深入实施稳增长工作方案，保障重点行业平稳增长。全面落实全国新型工业化推进大会工作部署，抓紧出台配套政策文件。继续支持工业大省“勇挑大梁”，支持京津冀、长三角、粤港澳大湾区等加快发展，形成更多产业增长极。

;

;二是多措并举扩大需求。紧盯四季度可达产重大项目，推动政府投资和民间投资加大力度。发挥国家制造业转型升级基金、中小企业发展基金等作用，进一步带动社会资本投资。抓住四季度重要消费节点，推进新能源汽车、绿色建材、智能家电等优质产品下乡。支持视听电子、冰雪装备、智慧健康养老等创新发展，扩大和升级信息消费、绿色消费。

;

;三是加快培育新动能新优势。完善制造业技术改造支持政策，引导企业加大新技术、新设备、新工艺投入。巩固提升5G、新能源汽车等重点产业优势，推动算力基础设施和通信设备产业高质量发展。实施智能制造工程，推进人工智能全方位、深层次赋能新型工业化。加快新材料等新兴产业发展，前瞻布局未来产业，培育一批国家级工业设计中心。

;

;四是积极营造良好发展环境。统筹推进国家自主创新示范区、国家高新技术产业开发区建设，打造更多高质量的先进制造业集群和中小企业特色产业集群。健全与制造业头部企业、专精特新中小企业的沟通交流机制，持续开展拖欠中小企业账款清理工作。认真落实全面取消制造业领域外资准入限制措施，推进新工业革命伙伴关系建设。

;

;;推动中小企业加快复苏，实现平稳健康发展;

;

;记者：中小企业联系千家万户，是推动创新、促进就业、改善民生的重要力量。工业和信息化部将采取哪些措施更好服务和支持中小企业发展？

;

;金壮龙：前三季度，规模以上工业中小企业营业收入、利润总额均实现由降转增。同时也要看到，当前中小企业订单不足、成本上升、回款困难等问题较为突出。下一步，我们将坚持“两个毫不动摇”，坚持管理和服务并重，坚持帮扶和发展并举，重点抓好四方面工作。

;

;一是营造公平竞争环境。深入贯彻《中共中央国务院关于促进民营经济发展壮大的意见》，全面落实中小企业促进法。严格执行《保障中小企业款项支付条例》，集中化解一批拖欠中小企业账款。开展促进中小企业发展工作综合督查和中小企业发展环境第三方评估，推动各类惠企政策落地生效。

;

;二是支持专精特新发展。研究出台促进专精特新中小企业高质量发展的若干措施。开展促进大中小企业融通创新携手行动和中央企业产业链融通发展共链行动，带动专精特新企业参与国家重大工程项目。支持一批专精特新中小企业成长为独角兽企业。抓实首批30个中小企业数字化转型城市试点。

;

;三是强化精准高效服务。出台健全中小企业公共服务体系的指导意见，深入开展“一起益企”行动，帮助企业解决难题。实施专精特新中小企业上市培育工程，不断提高中小企业融资覆盖面、可得性。继续实施“科技成果赋智”“质量标准品牌赋值”“数字化赋能”中小企业专项行动，促进中小企业向价值链中高端迈进。

;

;四是加强国际交流合作。加大中小企业“走出去”“引进来”工作力度，发挥双多边中小企业合作机制作用，共建“一带一路”合作服务平台，办好中国国际中小企业博览会和APEC中小企业技展会，支持中小企业用好两个市场、两种资源。

;

;;深入推进新型工业化，加快构建现代化产业体系;

;

;记者：加快构建以先进制造业为骨干的现代化产业体系，必须把建设制造强国同发展数字经济、产业信息化等有机结合。请问工业和信息化部下一阶段将如何把握推进新型工业化这一关键任务？

;

;金壮龙：我们将着力补齐短板、拉长长板、锻造新板，提高先进制造业水平，为建设现代化产业体系提供坚实支撑。

;

;一是改造升级传统产业。针对重点行业、重点领域制定数字化转型行动方案。实施制造业技术改造工程，落实税收优惠和专项再贷款政策。依法依规、稳妥有序淘汰落后产能和化解过剩产能，强化优质达标项目要素保障。加快传统产业绿色化改造，打造绿色工厂、绿色园区和绿色供应链，完善绿色制造和服务体系。

;

;二是巩固提升优势产业。我国轨道交通装备、太阳能光伏、锂电池等领域已形成规模和技术优势，要继续推进强链延链补链，提升全产业链竞争优势。深入实施产业基础再造工程和重大技术装备攻关工程，提高产业链供应链韧性和安全水平。高水平建设国家制造业创新中心，打造一批中试和应用验证平台，加速科技成果工程化和产业化。大力实施标准提档升级。

;

;三是培育壮大新兴产业。聚焦5G、先进计算、生物医药等领域，系统推进技术创新、规模化发展和产业生态建设。加强重点行业生产能力、投资等监测预警，防止低水平重复建设。

;

;四是前瞻布局未来产业。制定实施未来产业发展行动计划等政策文件，加快技术、材料研发应用，统筹推进标准研制，促进形成新质生产力。支持地方立足各自优势，在应用场景构建、人才引育、产融合作等方面积极探索，培育一批未来产业高地。

;

;五是推进产业集群化发展。优化国家高新区布局，加强管理服务，打造开放创新的世界一流高科技产业园区。实施先进制造业集群发展专项行动，引导各地发挥比较优势，形成更多专业化、差异化、特色化产业集群。支持45个国家先进制造业集群，加快向世界级水平提升。

;

;建设现代化产业体系，我们还将坚持开放发展理念，支持更多优势企业“走出去”，更大力度引导外资投向先进制造业和高新技术产业，持续做好项目服务保障，支持外资企业在华设立研发中心，在新型工业化进程中收获更多发展成果。
